attributes.action: Completely stop buying Russian gas, urge Europe to do the same.
attributes.additional_details: By depriving Russia of revenue, their economy will suffer a sharper impact, hastening the sanctions impact, thereby saving lives and reducing suffering in Ukraine.
attributes.background: Europe buys lots of gas from Russia, undermining the effectiveness of freezing Russian foreign reserves.  Stopping buying their gas deprives them of the revenue needed for Russia to function and will help bring about Russian populous uprising to end the Ukraine war.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban all imports of Russian oil and gas immediately: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610289

Since you started your petition the Government has announced plans to phase out Russian oil imports by the end of the year. Find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-to-phase-out-russian-oil-imports

And you can find details of the UK’s sanctions regime relating to Russia here: https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/uk-sanctions-on-russia
